name: RolePG of the Dice
description:
You are a die, pure of heart and stout of mind. However, your casting is getting a little…old. It’s time for a new one. Rumor has it that an ancient Altar of Casting rests at the heart of the nearby wood. You grab your trusty sword and set out into the wilderness on an epic quest

This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2022. 

Developed by LegitSticks.

Art/Design by ThePenGolem
